review: Bought this for my mother. Out of the box was extremely easy setup with a very informative mini movie in the beginning to get even the novice of tech users going! Fantastic user interface with a well designed selection of additional apps. Very pleased with the purchase and for any other tvs I purchase in the future this will be a must have for them. Also, the hdmi extender was very nice because these days some of the backing down of the tvs are not well designed so having that extra play room was nice! Great job Amazon!
